mapper.insert: INSERT INTO q_board(seq, title, content, createdate, id) VALUES ( seq_q_board.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{qmember.id} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT CEIL(ROWNUM/10) AS PAGE, A.* FROM (SELECT q.seq, q.title, q.content, q.anser, m.email FROM q_board q INNER JOIN member m ON q.id = m.id ORDER BY seq DESC) A ) WHERE PAGE = #{page}
